markdownRemark.html: The Bullring of the Real Maestranza de Caballería de Sevilla is a monument considered to be the most important square relevant to the greatest bullfighting tradition in Spain. One of the most relevant collections of bullfighting art at universal level are kept here.

frontmatter.title: Real Maestranza
frontmatter.description: Real Maestranza - The Bullring of the Real Maestranza de Caballería de Sevilla is a monument considered to be the most important square relevant to the greatest bullfighting tradition in Spain. One of the most relevant collections of bullfighting art at universal level are kept here.
frontmatter.price: Adult 8.00 euro, Students and Senior Citizens 5.00 euro and children 3.00 euro
tags: Top things to do in Seville
